H0.text: In which part of the human body can you find the Malleus or Hammer bone . Wrist

H1.text: In which part of the human body can you find the Malleus or Hammer bone . Ankle

H2.text: In which part of the human body can you find the Malleus or Hammer bone . Knee

H3.text: In which part of the human body can you find the Malleus or Hammer bone . Ucho

A4.text: It transmits the sound vibrations from the eardrum to the incus.

A5.text: The malleus is one of three ossicles in the middle ear which transmit sound from the tympanic membrane (ear drum) to the inner ear.
